Name: worker_status_active
Description: Only workers with an 'active' status can be assigned to tasks.

Name: project_status_not_completed
Description: Teams can only be assigned to projects that are not yet completed.

Name: team_size_limit
Description: The number of workers in a team must not exceed 9.

Name: task_effort_is_positive
Description: Any defined task must have an effort greater than zero.

Name: sprint_capacity_check
Description: The sum of story points in a sprint must not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: blocker_status_is_open
IsSum: the corresponding blocker status must be 'open'.

Name: worker_availability
Description: The sum of effort for tasks assigned to a worker must not exceed their availability.

Name: budget_is_positive
Description: A project must have a budget greater than zero to be started.

Name: sprint_dates_logical
Description: The start date of a sprint must be before its end date.

Name: mandatory_product_owner
Description: Every project must have an assigned Product Owner.

Name: scrum_master_per_team
Description: Every team must have a Scrum Master.

Name: feature_priority_is_set
Description: A feature cannot be planned in a release without a defined priority.

Name: story_points_are_set
Description: A user story must have story points assigned before being added to a sprint.
